Text.Language: Areh e~roi panou]: e~bolha nidemwn: eybe ]macnou]: nem pieyouab Carapamwn.

Come all, O the God-lovingÂ / people of Jesus Christ,Â / to glorify the VirginÂ / and Sarapamon the Bishop.
